title: New tax hikes for the UK's middle class
subhead: Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves unveiled significant tax increases during her budget presentation on Wednesday, November 26. She faced the difficult task of reassuring both the markets and Labour MPs.

title: Two National Guard members critically wounded in shooting near White House
subhead: President Donald Trump said that the suspect in the shooting was an Afghan man who fled the Taliban, calling it an 'act of terror.' Five hundred more National Guard members are heading to Washington.

title: Leo XIV to visit Turkey and Lebanon on his first papal trip
subhead: On his debut on the international stage, the head of the Catholic Church will celebrate the 1,700th anniversary of the Council of Nicaea on Lake Iznik, at the invitation of the patriarch of Constantinople. The stop in Lebanon gives him the opportunity to send a message to a region in crisis.

title: Germany's pension reform becomes a generational conflict
subhead: The plan agreed upon by coalition members is to maintain pension levels despite the aging population. But it is opposed by young conservatives, who are calling for more sweeping reforms.
